name: @iota/identity-wasm
description: WASM bindings for IOTA Identity - A Self Sovereign Identity Framework implementing the DID and VC standards from W3C. To be used in Javascript/Typescript

scripts.bundle:nodejs: wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/identity_wasm.wasm --typescript --weak-refs --target nodejs --out-dir node && node ./build/node && tsc --project ./lib/tsconfig.json && node ./build/replace_paths ./lib/tsconfig.json node
scripts.bundle:web: wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/identity_wasm.wasm --typescript --weak-refs --target web --out-dir web && node ./build/web && tsc --project ./lib/tsconfig.web.json && node ./build/replace_paths ./lib/tsconfig.web.json web
scripts.build:nodejs: npm run build:src && npm run bundle:nodejs && wasm-opt -O node/identity_wasm_bg.wasm -o node/identity_wasm_bg.wasm
scripts.build:web: npm run build:src && npm run bundle:web && wasm-opt -O web/identity_wasm_bg.wasm -o web/identity_wasm_bg.wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:nodejs && npm run build:docs
scripts.test: npm run test:unit:node && npm run test:examples
scripts.test:examples: npm run test:readme && concurrently -g --timings "npm run test:node" "npm run test:browser:parallel"
scripts.test:browser:parallel: npm run build:examples:web && cypress-parallel -s test:browser -t 4 -d cypress/e2e -a '"--quiet"'
